scripts.graphile: postgraphile --subscriptions --watch --dynamic-json --no-setof-functions-contain-nulls --no-ignore-rbac --no-ignore-indexes --show-error-stack=json --extended-errors hint,detail,errcode --append-plugins @graphile-contrib/pg-simplify-inflector --export-schema-graphql data/schema.graphql --graphiql "/" --enhance-graphiql --allow-explain --enable-query-batching --legacy-relations omit --connection "postgres://beachvolley_graphile:dev_password@localhost:5432/beachvolley" --owner-connection "postgres://beachvolley_graphile_superuser:dev_password@localhost:5432/beachvolley" --default-role beachvolley_graphile_anonymous --schema beachvolley_public
